Healthy.fertilizer: No fertilizer needed. Maintain regular watering and sunlight.
Healthy.prevention: Keep monitoring for any early signs of disease.

Powdery mildew.fertilizer: Use sulfur-based fungicides or neem oil spray once a week.
Powdery mildew.prevention: Avoid overhead watering, improve air circulation, and use resistant plant varieties.

Leaf spot.fertilizer: Apply copper fungicide or organic compost to boost immunity.
Leaf spot.prevention: Remove infected leaves and water at the soil level.

Early blight.fertilizer: Use potassium-rich fertilizer and apply a fungicide like chlorothalonil.

Late blight.prevention: Remove infected plants immediately and avoid overhead watering.
